name: The Crystal Energy
description:
An action packed, space themed survival shooter, with aliens, crystals and spaceships!!! Enjoy this action packed adventure as you save this astronaut traveler on his way back from deep space. 

With only 3 functioning gadgets: your spacesuit, your plasma gun, and your plasma vacum.3999, use these tools wisely  as you transfer energy from the crystals into your suit and then into your ships battery. But be careful not to drain all of your precious, (life supporting) energy, or you will surely die in space with no one  to find your remains (duh).
